name: Turk's Crawling Dungeon
description:
Turk's Crawling Dungeon is a prototype dungeon crawler RPG. Explore the treacherous psychic labyrinth of a troubled young man with a broken heart...

CONTENT WARNING: Blood, violence, strong language, themes of mental illness, mentions of suicide, and mild nudity.

Premise:

Turk wakes up bleeding in an unfamiliar place. His mind pulses with singular purpose. Find a way back to Ren, no matter what the cost. To escape the dangers of this strange and terrible place, Turk will need to use every skill at his disposal. Scavenge for tools, fabricate a means of self-defense, and battle your way past the eldritch creatures that lurk here...

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys / numpad numbers (5 to pass turn)

Interact: Enter

Help: F1

Cancel: Space

Smash: S

Get: G

Look: L

Zoom In / Out: + / -

Open Options Menu: Escape

Open Crafting Menu: C

Open Health Menu: H

Open Inventory: I
